meanings: lo âu, lo lắng, băn khoăn
examples: She waited anxiously for the results.
He looked at her anxiously.

meanings: một người, vật nào đó; bất cứ; một chút nào, tí nào
examples: Do you have any questions?
She didn't see any reason to stay.
Anyone can join the club.
Is there anybody home?

meanings: việc gì, vật gì; bất cứ việc gì, vật gì
examples: Do you need anything?
She didn't say anything.

meanings: thế nào cũng được, dù sao chăng nữa
examples: Anyway, let's move on.
She didn't like the idea, but she agreed anyway.

meanings: bất cứ chỗ nào, bất cứ nơi đâu
examples: You can find this book anywhere.
Is there anywhere we can sit?

meanings: về một bên, qua một bên
examples: They live apart now.
She stood apart from the group.
Apart from the weather, the trip was great.
Apart from John, everyone was present.
Aside from the cost, the project is feasible.
Aside from a few minor issues, everything is fine.
She lives in a small apartment.
The apartment is on the third floor.
She apologized for her mistake.
He apologized to her for being late.

meanings: rõ ràng, rành mạch; bề ngoài, có vẻ
examples: It was apparent that she was upset.
His apparent lack of interest was concerning.
Apparently, he didn't know about the meeting.
She was apparently unaware of the situation.

meanings: sự kêu gọi, lời kêu gọi; kêu gọi, cầu khẩn
examples: The charity made an appeal for donations.
He appealed to the crowd for calm.

meanings: xuất hiện, hiện ra, trình diện
examples: She appeared suddenly.
He appeared in court.

meanings: sự xuất hiện, sự trình diện
examples: Her appearance was unexpected.
He made a brief appearance at the party.
She ate an apple for breakfast.
The apple tree is in full bloom.

meanings: sự gắn vào, vật gắn vào; sự chuyên cần, chuyên tâm
examples: She submitted her job application.
The application of this technology is widespread.

meanings: gắn vào, ghép vào, áp dụng vào
examples: She applied for the job.
He applied the new method to his work.
She was appointed as the new manager.
They appointed him to the committee.

meanings: sự bổ nhiệm, người được bổ nhiệm
examples: She has a doctor's appointment.
His appointment as CEO was announced.
I appreciate your help.
She appreciates the support.

meanings: đến gần, lại gần; sự đến gần, sự lại gần
examples: She approached the podium.
His approach to the problem was innovative.
Her dress was appropriate for the occasion.
The response was appropriate to the situation.

meanings: sự tán thành, đồng ý, sự chấp thuận
examples: She received approval for her project.
His plan met with approval.

meanings: tán thành, đồng ý, chấp thuận
examples: Her parents approve of her decision.
The committee approved the proposal.

meanings: tán thành, đồng ý, chấp thuận
examples: She gave an approving nod.
He looked at her with approving eyes.
The approximate cost is $100.
The measurements are approximate.
The journey takes approximately two hours.
There were approximately 50 people at the event.
Her birthday is in April.
The event is scheduled for April.
The area of the park is large.
They live in a rural area.
They argued about the best course of action.
She argued that the decision was unfair.
They had a heated argument.
His argument was convincing.

meanings: xuất hiện, nảy ra, nảy sinh ra
examples: Problems may arise if you don't follow the instructions.
A new opportunity has arisen.

meanings: cánh tay; vũ trang, trang bị (vũ khí)
examples: He broke his arm.
The soldiers were armed with rifles.
The bank was robbed by armed men.
The police were armed and ready.

meanings: vũ khí, binh giới, binh khí
examples: The country is stockpiling arms.
He was arrested for carrying illegal arms.
He joined the army.
The army was deployed to the conflict zone.
They walked around the park.
There are many shops around here.

meanings: sắp xếp, sắp đặt, sửa soạn
examples: She arranged the flowers in a vase.
They arranged a meeting for next week.

meanings: sự sắp xếp, sắp đặt, sự sửa soạn
examples: The arrangement of the furniture was perfect.
They made arrangements for the trip.
The police arrested the suspect.
His arrest was unexpected.
Her arrival was delayed.
The arrival of the train was announced.
She arrived at the airport.
They arrived in Paris.
He shot an arrow at the target.
The arrow missed its mark.
She studied art in college.
The museum has a great collection of art.
She wrote an article for the newspaper.
The article was well-received.
The flowers are artificial.
Artificial intelligence is a growing field.
The lake was artificially created.
The food is artificially flavored.
She is a talented artist.
The artist painted a beautiful landscape.
